kpi.name: ser_msc157b

kpi_info.title: Usage attempts of tele and bearer services in one MSC area
kpi_info.use: Indicates number of usage attempts of tele and bearer services in one MSC area.
kpi_info.formula:
sum(MSCSSM_USAGE) ;where service_id = any teleservices and bearer service code (excluding the supplementary services)


Counters from view(s):
RNS_PS_SERVI_{obj_agg}_{time_agg}

kpi.kpi_alias: Usage attempts of tele and bearer services in one MSC area
